p:
CHO has an orthorhombic structure with a = 5.719, b = 7.982, and c = 5.5578 Å
39 . The pseudocubic lattice constant is 3.990 Å. STO has a cubic lattice constant of 3.905 Å. The average lattice mismatch between them is +2.3%
39 . The XRD reciprocal space maps (Supplementary Fig. 1c, d) indicate that for both terminations of STO, the CHO films are constrained on the STO substrates, with an in-plane lattice constant of 3.905 Å and out-of-plane lattice constant of 4.075 Å for CHO/T-STO, and 4.102 Å for CHO/S-STO.
